Reviews.Title: Decent Product given the cost
Reviews.Author: N.C.H.
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived in a open box, however the contents appeared to be free from any use.  My suspicion is that the power cable was switched for a US plug.Works well, and easy to set up.  The operation is a bit sluggish compared to the GS4, however still manageable.  There are a few features missing that could be inconvenient for some people.  My suggestion would be to do a YouTube search on 'Galaxy Trend Duos' before purchasing.  The YouTube review by Tech2buzz.com sums up all the pros and cons.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!
Reviews.Author: Edith Jerez
Reviews.Content: I bought this Samsung for my niece and she loves it!! it's fast, light, and beautiful!! I think I should get one for me :)

ProductInfo.Features:
Cellular Band - Quad-Band 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 Mhz
Cellular Band 3G - 850 / 1900 Mhz
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Trend Lite GT-S7392L DUOS - DUAL SIM - UNLOCKED - BLACK
